channel.title: Need some help wiht the shops

item.title: Need some help wiht the shops
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

[quote=“owned112, post:1, topic:163485”]hey i need some help with adding a shop i dont really get where in my client.java to add this:

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 the_ulti_shop 1 1 6585 1000000 1149 1000000 1187 1000000 4087 5000000 3140 2500000 1377 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 2606 3093 0 0 0 0 0 1 stuff_for_sale!!@!

cud soemone post like pics or add my msn: volocityxd@hotmail.com[/quote]

ctrl + f then type in WanneShop = 2 then under the } put the code

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help wiht the shops

item.title: Need some help wiht the shops
item.dc:creator: @owned112 owned112
item.description:
@owned112 wrote:

hey i need some help with adding a shop i dont really get where in my client.java to add this:

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 the_ulti_shop 1 1 6585 1000000 1149 1000000 1187 1000000 4087 5000000 3140 2500000 1377 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 2606 3093 0 0 0 0 0 1 stuff_for_sale!!@!

cud soemone post like pics or add my msn: volocityxd@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help wiht the shops
